meanings.definition: A person who wears a vest.
meanings.sent1: The stylish vestee looked dapper in his outfit.
meanings.sent2: The vestee chose a blue vest to wear to the party.
meanings.sent3: The vestee accidentally wore two vests and looked like a fashion disaster.
meanings.sent4: She was the vestee of the group, always sporting different styles of vests.
meanings.sent5: The vestee's collection of vests was the envy of all his friends.

meanings.definition: A garment that is worn under a jacket or coat.
meanings.sent1: The vestee kept him warm during the chilly evening.
meanings.sent2: She wore a cozy vestee under her winter coat.
meanings.sent3: The vestee peeked out from under his jacket, adding a pop of color to his outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her vestee was like a hidden treasure, only visible when she took off her coat.
meanings.sent5: The vestee's soft fabric felt like a warm hug against her skin.
